alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:14AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Milwaukee, Walworth, southeastern Rock, Racine, southern Waukesha and western Kenosha Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 513 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Prairie to 6 miles southeast of Durand. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, Racine, New Berlin, Beloit, Greenfield, Oak Creek, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Greendale, Elkhorn, St. Francis, Delavan, Hales Corners, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago, Union Grove, East Troy, Paddock Lake, and Williams Bay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kenosha; Milwaukee; Racine; Rock; Walworth; Waukesha
